Document.Title: T-SQL: Stored Procedure Structure for Microsoft SQL Server 7.0/2000; Command Names Pattern

Content:
IF OBJECT_ID('_newproc') IS NOT NULL
BEGIN
    DROP PROCEDURE _newproc
    IF OBJECT_ID('_newproc') IS NOT NULL
        PRINT '<<< FAILED DROPPING PROCEDURE _newproc >>>'
    ELSE
        PRINT '<<< DROPPED PROCEDURE _newproc >>>'
END
GO

CREATE PROCEDURE _newproc
(
    @cmdName   varchar(32)  = 'default'
)

AS

-- Description: Renames the specified database.
-- Developer: rasx@songhaysystem.com
IF @cmdName = 'default'
BEGIN
END

GO

GRANT EXECUTE ON _newproc TO dbWebSolutionsUsers
GO

IF OBJECT_ID('_newproc') IS NOT NULL
    PRINT '<<< CREATED PROCEDURE _newproc >>>'
ELSE
    PRINT '<<< FAILED CREATING PROCEDURE _newproc >>>'
GO
